00042 {

00059

00068

00071

00087

00098

00108     virtual bool IsAnimated() const = 0;
00109 
00113     inline FCDAnimated* GetAnimated() { return const_cast<FCDAnimated*>(const_cast<const FCDTransform*>(this)->GetAnimated()); }
00114     virtual const FCDAnimated* GetAnimated() const = 0;
00115 
00122     virtual bool IsInverse(const FCDTransform* transform) const;

00309 {
00310 private:
00311     DeclareObjectType(FCDTransform);
00312     float angle;
00313     FMVector3 axis;
00314 
00315 public:
00323     FCDTRotation(FCDocument* document, FCDSceneNode* parent);
00324     
00326     virtual ~FCDTRotation();
00327 
00330     virtual Type GetType() const { return ROTATION; }
00331 
00335     inline FMVector3& GetAxis() { return axis; }
00336     inline const FMVector3& GetAxis() const { return axis; } 
00340     inline void SetAxis(const FMVector3& _axis) { axis = _axis; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00341 
00346     inline void SetAxis(float x, float y, float z) { axis = FMVector3(x, y, z); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00347 
00351     inline float& GetAngle() { return angle; }
00352     inline const float& GetAngle() const { return angle; } 
00356     inline void SetAngle(float a) { angle = a; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00357 
00361     inline void SetRotation(const FMVector3& _axis, float a) { axis = _axis; angle = a; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00362 
00365     inline FMQuaternion GetOrientation() { return FMQuaternion(axis, FMath::DegToRad(angle)); }
00366 
00369     inline void SetOrientation(const FMQuaternion& q) { q.ToAngleAxis(axis, angle); angle = FMath::RadToDeg(angle); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00370 
00373     virtual FMMatrix44 ToMatrix() const;
00374 
00377     virtual bool IsAnimated() const;
00378 
00383     inline FCDAnimated* GetAnimated() { return Parent::GetAnimated(); }
00384     virtual const FCDAnimated* GetAnimated() const; 
00391     virtual bool IsInverse(const FCDTransform* transform) const;
00392 
00396     virtual FCDTransform* Clone(FCDTransform* clone = NULL) const;

00403 
00407     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
